column4: I've got a question. I'm trying to boot Ubuntu from the CD, but when it tries to boot from the CD it givs this error: " PXE-E53: Not boot filename received'
you do not have your machine to (A) boot from the CD drive, or (B) there is no OS on the hard drive,  it is failing to find something to boot over the wire
boot order is corret, cd too, I don't have that much knowledge from bios though :|
your cd is not booting - burn it again, as an "ISO image" not as a file
